arm_group.description: Comparison of cLMA insertion via laryngoscope view by fiberscope
Comparison of cLMA insertion via standart technique view by fiberscope

brief_summary.textblock:
it is compared that  laryngeal mask insertion with standard technique and laryngoscopic
      technique

clinical_study.brief_title: Does Laryngoscopic Tecnique Facilitate cLMA Insertion?

detailed_description.textblock:
Is there any releation between insertion succes rate and difficult intubation criteria.
      success of the first attempt laryngeal mask insertion, patient response of laryngeal mask
      placement.  And also during the implementation of these two techniques; the effects on heart
      rate and blood pressure and postoperative complications were investigated.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Over 18 age

          -  under urologic surgery patient

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Uper respiratory infection

          -  Full stomach

          -  BMI over 40
